text: Oh...
Kogane-chan...?
At the watch shop...?

Yeah~
Behind the window...

When I was a kid, there was something in there
that looked just like my favorite watch back then.
It was so nostalgic to see~

I see...
Which one was it?
That one~!

With the black and white rabbits on the hands...
Ain't they cute?

Hehe...
Looks like they're playing tag...

It was my absolute favorite,
but somehow, it disappeared from my wrist...

Well then...
maybe it went on a little journey...

And maybe...
it came back...
Hehe, that would be nice, wouldn't it...?
Should we buy it...?

Hmm~~~...
Let's just leave it for now!

Look, there's a girl over there...
Seems like she's interested in buying it...
Ah...

So, after all that circling around,
it looks like it's not coming home with us...

Hehe...
Yeah...
